content: and depending on your size knit or purl these two stitches together knit or purl 1 depending on your size place the bobby pin then turn 4 sts have been increased row 8 ws follow the chart to raglan marker according to your size then purl to the beginning of the round to the tail of yarn purl to marker m1r purl raglan stitch m1l purl to marker left sleeve page 4 of 9 m1r purl raglan stitch m1l purl/knit to the gap according to your size slip the next stitch from the left needle to the right needle place stitch from the bobby pin on the left needle slip back the stitch from the right needle and depending on your size knit or purl these two stitches together knit or purl 1 depending on your size place the bobby pin then turn 4 sts have been increased row 9 rs follow the chart to raglan marker according to your size then knit to the beginning of the round to the tail of yarn knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to marker right sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to the gap while following the chart pick up the stitch with the bobby pin from behind place it on the left needle and knit the next two stitches together follow the chart with the purl stitches only knit to the last stitch middle of front increase 1 stitch from between two stitches see video instructions on hunglish knitter youtube channel note this time we do not return but complete the whole row continue to knit to 1stitch before the next gap while following the chart with purl stitches using a crochet-hook poke through the last stitch before the gap and the bobby pin stitch from behind at the same time with the hook knit these two together and place the stitch on the right needle knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to marker left sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn 8 sts have been increased the shaping of the neckline with short row has been completed there is now a total of 141 145 149 153 161 sts on the needle distribution of sts 22 23 24 24 26 sts right back 1 raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts right sleeve 1 raglan sts 45 47 49 49 53 sts front 1 raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts left sleeve 1 raglan sts 22 23 24 24 26 sts left back page 5 of 9 raglan increases on the yoke now continue in the round on the circular needle from the rs while working raglan increases on every other round as follows row 9 was with increases so the next one is round 1 knit across round 2 * knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l * work from * to * a total of 4 times
